"SkyBall" - A sport that combines elements of volleyball and ultimate frisbee, where players pass a ball back and forth over a high net in an open field.
"Spikeball" - A sport where players wear helmets and use their elbows to hit a small, lightweight ball over a net to score points.
"Buzkashi" - A sport where players on horseback try to drag a goat or calf across a goal line.
"Zorbing" - A sport where players roll down a hill in a giant inflatable ball.
"Snowboarding" - A sport where players slide down a mountain on a snowboard.
